name: my-color-palettes-storage
title: My Color Palettes Storage
description: Do you have a beatiful color palette and would you like to save it and access it quickly with Raycast? This extension is for you!
author: elibattistoni

commands.name: save-color-palettes
commands.title: Save Color Palettes
commands.subtitle: Save your favorite color palettes
commands.description: Save beautiful color palettes that you have created

commands.name: view-color-palettes
commands.title: View Color Palettes
commands.subtitle: View your favorite color palettes
commands.description: View beautiful color palettes that you have created

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
